## 3. ê° ì•¡ì…˜ ìƒì„¸ ì„¤ëª…

### 3.1 íŠ¸ë¦¬ê±°: ë©”ì¼ ìˆ˜ì‹ 

```json
{
  "When_a_new_email_arrives_(V3)": {
    "type": "ApiConnection",
    "recurrence": {
      "frequency": "Minute",
      "interval": 1
    },
    "inputs": {
      "path": "/v3/Mail/OnNewEmail",
      "queries": {
        "folderPath": "Inbox",
        "importance": "Any"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

**ë™ì‘**:
- 1ë¶„ë§ˆë‹¤ Inbox í´ë” í™•ì¸
- ìƒˆ ë©”ì¼ ë°œê²¬ ì‹œ ì›Œí¬í”Œë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰
- `splitOn`ìœ¼ë¡œ ë©”ì¼ë³„ ê°œë³„ ì‹¤í–‰

### 3.2 ì¤‘ë³µ ì²´í¬ (Table Storage)

```json
{
  "Check_MessageId_Exists_In_TableStorage": {
    "type": "Http",
    "inputs": {
      "method": "GET",
      "uri": "https://{storage}.table.core.windows.net/ProcessedEmails(PartitionKey='yyyy-MM',RowKey='messageId')",
      "authentication": {
        "type": "ManagedServiceIdentity",
        "audience": "https://storage.azure.com/"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

**í…Œì´ë¸” êµ¬ì¡°**:
| PartitionKey | RowKey | Subject | ProcessedTime |
|--------------|--------|---------|---------------|
| 2026-01 | `<abc123@mail.com>` | ë©”ì¼ ì œëª© | 2026-01-24T12:00:00Z |

**ì™œ ì´ë ‡ê²Œ ì„¤ê³„í–ˆë‚˜?**:
- **PartitionKey**: ì›” ë‹¨ìœ„ë¡œ ë¶„ë¦¬ â†’ ì„±ëŠ¥ ìµœì í™”
- **RowKey**: MessageId â†’ ì¤‘ë³µ í™•ì¸ O(1)

### 3.3 AI ë¶„ì„ (Azure OpenAI)

```json
{

          { "role": "system", "content": "ë©”ì¼ ë¶„ì„ ì „ë¬¸ê°€ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤..." },
```

```
(2-3ë¬¸ì¥ ìš”ì•½)
```

### 3.4 Work Item ìƒì„± + í•„ë“œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸

**ì™œ 2ë‹¨ê³„ë¡œ ë‚˜ë‰˜ì—ˆë‚˜?**

```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”     â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚  Create_ADO_WorkItem    â”‚â”€â”€â”€â”€â–¶â”‚  Update_ADO_Fields      â”‚
â”‚  (API Connection)       â”‚     â”‚  (HTTP + PAT)           â”‚
â”‚                         â”‚     â”‚                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ title âœ…             â”‚     â”‚  â€¢ System.AssignedTo âœ… â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ description âœ…       â”‚     â”‚  â€¢ System.Tags âœ…       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ assignedTo âŒ ì•ˆë¨   â”‚     â”‚                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ tags âŒ ì•ˆë¨         â”‚     â”‚                         â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜     â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

**í•µì‹¬ ì´ìœ **:
- VSTS ì»¤ë„¥í„°ëŠ” `assignedTo`, `tags` í•„ë“œë¥¼ **ì§€ì›í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ**
- ë³„ë„ HTTP ì•¡ì…˜ìœ¼ë¡œ JSON Patch í˜•ì‹ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ í•„ìš”

**Update ì•¡ì…˜ ì½”ë“œ**:
```json
{
  "Update_ADO_WorkItem_Fields": {
    "type": "Http",
    "inputs": {
      "method": "PATCH",
      "uri": "https://dev.azure.com/{org}/{project}/_apis/wit/workitems/{id}?api-version=7.1",
      "headers": {
        "Content-Type": "application/json-patch+json",
        "Authorization": "Basic @{base64(concat(':', appsetting('ADO_PAT')))}"
      },
      "body": [
        { "op": "add", "path": "/fields/System.AssignedTo", "value": "@{variables('RecipientEmail')}" },
        { "op": "add", "path": "/fields/System.Tags", "value": "CM Worker Manager" }
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

| ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ | ì¸ì¦ ë°©ì‹ | ì„¤ì • ìœ„ì¹˜ | ë¹„ê³  |

| **Table Storage** | Managed Identity | workflow.json | MSI + RBAC |

| **ADO (Work Item ìƒì„±)** | OAuth (API Connection V2) | connections.json | ì‚¬ìš©ì ë™ì˜ í•„ìš” |

## 5. íŒŒì¼ êµ¬ì¡°

### í•µì‹¬ íŒŒì¼ 3ê°œ

```

â”‚   â””â”€â”€ workflow.json         â† ëª¨ë“  ë¡œì§ì´ ì—¬ê¸°ì—!
```

### workflow.json êµ¬ì¡°

```json

    "actions": {
```

### connections.json êµ¬ì¡°

```json
{
  "serviceProviderConnections": {
    "azureOpenAI": {
      "parameterValues": {
        "openAIKey": "@appsetting('AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY')",
        "openAIEndpoint": "@appsetting('AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT')"
      }
    }
  },
  "managedApiConnections": {
    "office365": { "connectionRuntimeUrl": "@appsetting(...)" },
    "teams": { "connectionRuntimeUrl": "@appsetting(...)" },
    "visualstudioteamservices": { "connectionRuntimeUrl": "@appsetting(...)" }
  }
}
```

---
